 /**
  * An instance of {@link java.lang.RuntimeException}.

  * @author ccoman

 public class CosmoInterruptedException extends CosmoException {
 
     /**
-     *

      */
     private static final long serialVersionUID = -5183553666909798219L;

         super(cause);
